room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: After a little trouble finding the place, check in was easy. We were taken to "The Agency" room with not much guidance except to just figure a way out, no story line or anything. The clues themselves were very random. At the end, we actually found the key to exit but were told we had to finish another obstacle before using the key. They should not have made the key accessible before having to finish another obstacle.Overall, I think they need to find a better flow/riddles with their clues.  The room itself was very cool but otherwise the experience was just OK.

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: We did the "Agency". Difficult, yet so much fun. Great facility. Great staff that was friendly and attentive. Looking forward to trying more rooms in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: We had a blast in The Agency. Lots of team work required!

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: So much fun!! Loved it. Great place to go with a group of friends

room_title: Escape room "Agency" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Great experience and really gets you thinking! We did "The Agency" and didn't make it out but had fun anyway. The best thing to remember is that everything you see is a potential clue!
